relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops or rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, crackles, or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Mildly rigid with guarding, non-distended, tenderness to palpation mostly in right lower quadrant, positive rebound tenderness, no signs of Rovsing's, psoas, or obturator signs.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused.
